thread.title: Trump Addresses Anti-Semitic Threats, Kansas Shooting in Speech: We Condemn All ‘Hate and Evil’
thread.title_full: Trump Addresses Anti-Semitic Threats, Kansas Shooting in Speech: We Condemn All ‘Hate and Evil’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Trump Addresses Anti-Semitic Threats, Kansas Shooting in Speech: We Condemn All ‘Hate and Evil’
text:
Trump Addresses Anti-Semitic Threats, Kansas Shooting in Speech: We Condemn All ‘Hate and Evil’ by Josh Feldman | 9:20   
President Trump began his first address to a joint session of Congress tonight condemning recent anti-Semitic threats and vandalism, as well as the recent Kansas shooting of two Indian immigrants . 
He first acknowledged the end of Black History month before bringing up the above in saying that while we may be divided on politics, we must all be united in “condemning hate and evil in all of its very ugly forms.” 
Watch above, via CNN.
